nodes.text: An individual was employed by the crime lord Jurga the Hutt. To symbolize his power, Jurga wore a Tenloss disruptor on a sash. At one point, the individual became outraged and used the disruptor to disintegrate Jurga, thus killing him.

The individual in Jurga the Hutt's employ was first mentioned in an entry for Tenloss disruptors in the 2002 Wizards of the Coast Star Wars Roleplaying Game sourcebook Arms & Equipment Guide, which was written by Jeff Grubb and Owen K.C. Stephens.
